original_text: So Pharaoh called Joseph to come to him. They quickly brought Joseph from the prison. Joseph washed himself and he cut his beard from his face. He put on clean clothes. Then he went and he stood in front of Pharaoh.
korean_text: 이에 바로가 사람을 보내어 요셉을 부르매 그들이 급히 그를 옥에서 내 놓은지라 요셉이 곧 수염을 깎고 그의 옷을 갈아 입고 바로에게 들어가니

sentences.original_text: So Pharaoh called Joseph to come to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 바로는 요셉을 불러 자기에게 오게 했다

sentences.original_text: They quickly brought Joseph from the prison
and he cut his beard from his face
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자신의 얼굴에서 수염을 깎았다

sentences.original_text: and he stood in front of Pharaoh
